infos.homeDescription: Full stack developer passionate about building efficient solutions focused on performance and user experience.
infos.homeStack: I work with technologies like Java, Spring Boot, React, TypeScript, and NodeJS and NestJS.
infos.aboutIntro: My journey in technology began with a degree in Computer Engineering from UNIVESP, where I developed a solid foundation in programming and problem-solving. I have experience in developing web applications using Java, Spring Boot, React, TypeScript, and other technologies.
infos.aboutCurrentJob: I currently work as a Full Stack Software Engineer at BMG Tecnologia, developing systems for business operations and management.
infos.aboutTech: I believe in clean code, focusing on performance, usability, and security. I am always looking for learning and collaboration opportunities to improve my skills and contribute to the success of my team.
